snippet: A committee of Parliament on Monday said government should clamp down on companies that exploit tax laws to move profits offshore.
abstract: British government plans to crack down on tax dodgers as parliamentary report criticizes United States companies for what it describes as tax avoidance.
lead_paragraph: A committee of Parliament on Monday said government should clamp down on companies that exploit tax laws to move profits offshore.

headline.main: British Lawmakers Accuse Multinationals of ‘Immorally’ Avoiding Taxes
headline.print_headline: Britain Says It Will Go After Tax Dodgers
